page.title: 14Jones'Restored Army Vehicles
page.content: Mr.Jones'dad started the garage in 1928,and Mr.Jones started to work on the pumps when he was ten.He doesn't sell cars now.He just mends them.His special hobby is restoring 2nd World War army vehicles.He has got 14 vehicles in his collection.They have been in some films and television serials. When we were there he was restoring a D.U.K.W,a Tank,and an RAF staff car. The{D.U.K.W}is like a boat on wheels. You could fit 50 people in the back but it did not look like it. The seats in the front of the D.U.K.W are very hard.The{Tank}is in bits at the moment.I was surprised to see that bullets had gone right through one side of the tank's turret and marked the other side.The{RAF staff car}had blackout covers on the headlights so that bombers could not see them.
